ingredients.name: Organic Bok Choy
ingredients.quality_notes: Triple-washed, pesticide-free, harvested within 48 hours of delivery.

ingredients.name: Artisan Non-GMO Tofu
ingredients.quality_notes: Made from heritage soybeans using traditional stone-grinding methods.

ingredients.name: Pasture-Raised Chicken
ingredients.quality_notes: Antibiotic-free, vegetable-fed, raised in stress-free environments.

ingredients.name: Aged Brewed Soy Sauce
ingredients.quality_notes: Naturally brewed for 6 months using only four ingredients: water, soy, wheat, salt.

ingredients.name: Chef's Signature Sichuan Peppercorns
ingredients.quality_notes: Grade A 'Dahongpao' variety, known for intense citrus notes and numbing effect.
